dialogue.name: Zed
dialogue.text: I didnâ€™t expect that we will discover an island far in the mainland.

dialogue.name: Deemo
dialogue.text: But even though it is very far, human garbage finds its way in.

dialogue.name: Zed
dialogue.text: Yes, you are right. Garbage is a problem in any part of the world.

dialogue.name: Deemo
dialogue.text: Hey Zed! There seems to be a person there. It seems we are not alone on this island.
